Searching CA Condensates On-Line vs. the CA Keyword Indexes .A Michaels, C. J. A study was conducted to compare the comprehensiveness of searches performed using Systems Development Corporation's (SDC) Chemcon data base and keyword indexes of Chemical Abstracts.. It was concluded that, in most cases, a computer search yielded at least as many relevant references as did a manual search.. However, in the case of very general search questions, results from manual searches were much more satisfactory..     .X 124	1	740 125	1	740 127	1	740 129	1	740 190	1	740 191	1	740 197	1	740 211	1	740 214	1	740 218	1	740 243	1	740 307	2	740 330	1	740 378	1	740 447	1	740 450	1	740 451	1	740 452	1	740 459	2	740 468	1	740 484	1	740 492	1	740 508	1	740 511	1	740 512	1	740 514	1	740 518	1	740 520	1	740 523	1	740 524	1	740 525	1	740 526	1	740 529	1	740 530	1	740 534	1	740 546	1	740 553	1	740 579	1	740 594	1	740 603	1	740 604	1	740 606	1	740 609	1	740 610	1	740 611	2	740 612	1	740 625	1	740 626	1	740 630	1	740 636	1	740 637	1	740 642	1	740 648	1	740 650	1	740 692	1	740 696	1	740 699	1	740 702	1	740 703	1	740 705	1	740 708	1	740 726	1	740 727	1	740 728	1	740 731	1	740 732	1	740 733	1	740 734	1	740 736	1	740 738	1	740 739	1	740 740	5	740 741	3	740 742	3	740 743	2	740 744	1	740 755	1	740 820	1	740 826	1	740 827	1	740 879	1	740 883	1	740 1004	1	740 1035	1	740 1078	1	740 1089	1	740 1091	1	740 1207	1	740 1264	1	740 1297	1	740 1303	1	740 1356	1	740 1364	1	740 1368	1	740 1370	1	740 1372	1	740 1373	1	740 1374	2	740 1375	1	740 1376	2	740 1377	1	740 1377	1	740
